Sales Associate Job at Supersaver Supermarket




        
    

        
        Supersaver Supermarket, established in 2013, is Nigeria's fastest growing brand in the retail sector with branches in diffrent parts of Lagos and massive expansion plans in various parts of the Nigeria. Our businesses cut across retail trade, wholesale trade, manufacturing and Agriculture.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales Associate
Job Locations: Ago - Okota, Ajao, Lekki - Admiralty & Lekki - Osapa, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
     

            
    




	Assist in the administration of floor staff/security
	Marketing and Improvement of sales in whatever shelf you are assigned to cater for.
	Appropriate and timely display of product meant for sale on your assigned units
	Compilation and timely submission of list of goods becoming due for restocking, this should be when stocks are not enough for two 2 weeks sales.
	Report of Goods that have less than 6 weeks to expire on your assigned shelf.
	Any other duties that may be assigned by your Supervisor.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess a minimum of SSCE / GCE / NECO qualification with 1+ years of relevant work experience.


Salary
N70,000 - N110,000 per month.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: supersaverhr@gmail.com using the Job Position and the preferred location as the subject of the email e.g "Sales Associate - Lekki Admiralty " or "Sales Associate - Ago".
